ValidationRule.description: Added 'IC' as per the request from GTMS-3623
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), AND( NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'SE')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'Management')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'CSM')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'CS')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'SIC')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'IC')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'TSE')), NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'Operations')) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Records can only be created by SE, TSE , CSM, Operations or management
